title: User Guide
subtitle: How to use InterTrader
body: InterTrader is designed to help you take advantage of the price variations between exchanges. This is a quick start guide with purely the essentials for you to use the app. ## Getting started ### Get the app If you haven't already, download and install the app from [Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=club.lambomoon.cec). ### Find some coins When InterTrader starts you'll be on the _Favourites_ page. This list will be empty, so start by tapping the _`Find some coins`_ button . ![Start page](/gin-data/images/1527767084077-start-page.png) ### Browse or search Tap the exchange you'd like to browse. If looking for a specific coin, tap the search icon in the top right corner and start typing out the _symbol_. ![Exchanges](/gin-data/images/1527767569202-exchange-list.png) ### Find your coin Browse the list of coins. Where possible, InterTrader will also the display the name of the coin as well as its ticker symbol so you differentiate between coins that share the same symbol. You can also add any coins directly to your _Favourites_ list by tapping the star. ![](/gin-data/images/1527769043366-coin-list.png) ### Compare prices Tap your preferred coin and you'll be taken to a screen similar to the one below. {{list type=page}}
